mappingFile.description: Path to a Castor mapping file to load from the classpath.

validation.description: Whether validation is turned on or off. Is by default true.

encoding.description: Encoding to use when marshalling an Object to XML. Is by default UTF-8

packages.description: Add additional packages to Castor XmlContext

classes.description: Add additional class names to Castor XmlContext

contentTypeHeader.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format if the data format is capable of doing so. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSon etc.

id.description: Sets the value of the id property.
